Title: Designates a portion of the New York state thruway as the Western New York Veterans Memorial Highway
Summary: Designates a portion of the New York state thruway as the "Western New York Veterans Memorial Highway".
LawCode: Amd ยง356-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to designating a portion of the New York state thruway as the "Western New York Veterans Memorial Highway"
